channel.title: Crash Course in Jewish Holidays: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Avraham Goldhar
channel.description: Learn how each of the Jewish holidays offer a unique spiritual energy that is available for you to tap into and benefit from the whole year.
